agent.display_value: GAIC Next action recommendation AI agent

sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.description: A GAIC Defect record is an unplanned interruption or reduction in the quality of service, i.e. something is broken or not working as expected. This tool is used to find the GAIC Defects that are similar to the given type of GAIC Defect. you will be passed table and record number as inputs.
sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.name: Get Similar GAIC Records

sys_update_version.name: sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_1172a7ed2bc32610bdb7f808b891bf02
